CustomField.description: Holds the API name of the field on the parent which stores the aggregated number of child rows (e.g., if there are 15 children for a parent, value will be "15")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Holds the API name of the field on the parent which stores the aggregated number of child rows (e.g., if there are 15 children for a parent, value will be "15")
CustomField.label: parentRowCount
